Field Label: Here you can report your positive and negative experiences associated with wearing the light glasses during your daily activities.

Field Label: Please try to remember or estimate when the experience happened
The experience I would like to report is

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Home | 2, Office or work-related space (e.g.: canteen) | 3, Public spaces (e.g.: supermarket, restaurant, shop, park etc.) | 4, Other

Field Label: Please provide a brief description of your experience, including the location, the activity you were performing and what feelings it triggered for you

Did this experience involve verbal or non-verbal feedback from others?

Example: comments or questions from people

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Friend or family member | 2, Colleague | 3, Acquaintance | 4, Stranger | 5, Other

Field Label: Please select the options that best describes the type feedback you received about the light glasses
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Comments about the light glasses | 2, Questions about the light glasses | 3, Looks due to the light glasses | 4, Concerns about the light glasses
